issue.title: [Release][Ruby] Check Homebrew/MSYS2 package version before releasing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14387](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14387). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`gem install red-arrow` is failed on macOS and Windows if Homebrew/MSYS2 packages aren't updated yet.
